Text: WTF? A different epub for every tablet?
It's a form of spamming that HyperSpammer666 loves to engage in. Every time he writes a book he spews it all over TPB in as many different formats as he can, one per torrent.

So then why doesn't someone lodge a complaint with the moderators?

They won't remove his posts, but they might warn him that he could be banned for spamming.
